alert.note: Alert for DeKalb (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central DeKalb County through 800 PM CDT... At 658 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sand Rock, or 9 miles southwest of Little River Canyon National Preserve. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy downpours reducing visibility. Ponding of water is also expected. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous travel due to the heavy downpours is expected. Locations impacted include... Fort Payne, Lebanon, Peeks Corner, Dog Town, Collbran and Little River Canyon NP. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
